reviewText: I didn't know this series existed till my 11 yrs old son watched an episode on tv, he was hooked and liked it so much .....givet it 4star cose the ending is not very satisfied....maybe for me....wiched there was more seasons
My students loved these and the books and they really helped to bring that time period to life.
This is a very well-made series, but it is a British series, and the DVDs are PAL format.  Plays great on my cheap $30 DVD player, but not on my expensive DVD player.
